exm.mng: Zayü county, Tibetan: Rdza yul rdzong, in Nyingchi prefecture 林芝地區|林芝地区[Lin2 zhi1 di4 qu1], Tibet
to lose at sunrise but gain at sunset (idiom); to compensate later for one's earlier loss, what you lose on the swings you gain on the roundabouts
exm.pyn: shī zhī dōng yú , shōu zhī sāng yú

exm.mng: Zayü county, Tibetan: Rdza yul rdzong, in Nyingchi prefecture 林芝地區|林芝地区[Lin2 zhi1 di4 qu1], Tibet
to be cramped in a corner (idiom)
lit. to face the corner (idiom), fig. to miss out on sth
to lose at sunrise but gain at sunset (idiom), to compensate later for one's earlier loss, what you lose on the swings you gain on the roundabouts
exm.pyn: shī zhī dōng yú , shōu zhī sāng yú
